Text:
hi guys!
have any one try it?

Works like a charm but be aware that you need to  alter the hostfile (copypast) 
127.0.0.1 live.virtualdj.com

and then save it (as admin) and you good to go! Works great and i was even able to use virtual dj remot on my iphone 5 on this copy which was a big surprise even to me! :-D
